import React, { useContext } from 'react' import {CheckoutSteps} from "../components/CheckoutSteps" import {Row,Col, Card,Button,ListGroup} from "react-bootstrap" import {Store} from "../Store" import {Link,useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const {state,dispatch:cxtDispatch}=useContext(Store); const {cart}=state; return (

Preview Order

Shipping Name:{cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country} Edit Payment Method: {cart.paymentMethod} Edit Items
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen;
